posts.author: ADW
posts.content:
This is a build request for a crafting-specialized character for the Blackstone Keep (EE) persistent world.

Requirements that I've heard of (hoping more experienced BSK players like @Cornflower will chime in with any additional reqs):
  • 80 Craft Armor skill
  • 80 Craft Weapon skill
Nice to have:
  • Easy to level (most likely in a party)
I've been told by a more experienced player on this PW that a suitable crafter build is 21 wiz / 19 bard, since with song and 12+ to int, you get you right to 80 in both crafting skills.
